image:image.image:title: Car Marketplace
image:image.image:caption: A sleek platform for buying and selling cars, designed to make the process seamless and user-friendly. This project highlights my ability to create intuitive interfaces and robust back-end systems.

image:image.image:title: Online Shopping Store
image:image.image:caption: An e-commerce site built to handle high traffic and provide a smooth shopping experience. It showcases my expertise in scalable solutions and performance optimization.

image:image.image:title: Winter Sports Hub
image:image.image:caption: A winter-themed platform for booking ski trips and winter gear. This project demonstrates my creativity and attention to detail in crafting engaging user experiences.

image:image.image:title: E-commerce Solutions
image:image.image:caption: A comprehensive e-commerce platform with advanced features like payment integration and inventory management. It reflects my ability to deliver complex solutions efficiently.

image:image.image:title: Health & Wellness App
image:image.image:caption: A healthcare app designed to connect users with wellness resources and track their health goals. This project highlights my focus on usability and accessibility.

image:image.image:title: Travel Booking Platform
image:image.image:caption: A travel website that simplifies booking flights, hotels, and activities. It showcases my skills in creating user-friendly interfaces and integrating third-party APIs.
